sentences.sContent: Children’s ideas of masculinity tend to come from their fathers.
sentences.sCn: 儿童的男性观念往往来自他们的父亲。

sentences.sContent: boys trying to prove their masculinity
sentences.sCn: 想证明自己的阳刚之气的男孩们

words.tran: 男性的；阳性的；男子气概的
使…雄性化；使男子化（尤指使女人具有男子特征）

trans.tranOther: the features and qualities considered to be typical of men
